sentence: Monica still has her big, frizzy hair.
Monica: Oh, the way you crushed Mike at ping pong was such a turn-on.You wanna...? (plays with her finger on Chandlers chest)
Monica: I'll put a pillowcase over my head.
(there's a door slamming in Ross's room, and some indistinct murmuring)
Chandler: He could be alone. This morning I heard him do push-ups, and then talk to his triceps.
Phoebe: Oh that tart... floozy... giant...
I'm not gonna eavesdrop on my friend.
(Chandler and Monica take a sprint to the other wall)
In the rooms next door, Joey, Rachel, Ross and Charlie stop kissing and try to understand what the yelling was about. After a while they continue kissing.
We're back in Chandler and Monica's room. Monica has some of her own hair stuffed in her mouth by Chandler.
Monica: (muffled) Thank you.
Chandler: How about the dinosaur twins in the other room? No-one is manning that wall!
Monica: I think I hear curtains closing...
Phoebe: We've got shoes being kicked off over here.
Chandler: Okay Buckwheat!
Charlie: Ooh... Is it because of what might be on the bedspread, because I saw that news report too, with the infra red and the ... I could just...
Ross: Alright, I'm gonna go find them... (twitches a bit, looks down) I just need a... need a before I can... you know.
I love you... Paradise Hotel, Golf resort and Spa...
Chandler: (caresses the wall with his finger) Bye!
For all he knows we're just hanging out together. Right? Just be nonchalant.
oey like stands at attention with his chest forward and his hands on his sides, looking up at the ceiling with his lips pouted.
Chandler opens the door inbetween the rooms, grabs Joey by his shirt and drags him to his room, and closes the door again
Rachel: Yeah, sure... (looks outside into the corridor if Joey is there)
he hesitates seeing himself in the mirror, but still puts his ear against it.
